attributes.action: CONSIDER EXEMPTION FROM ROAD PRICING/TAXATION FOR DISABLED USERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr. Blair - would it be possible to confirm whether or not people who are registered Disabled with Motability Parking Badges will be exempt from any road pricing/taxation costs.  As we, who are disabled, need to use our cars to simply get from 'A' to 'B' would we be included in any costs that would be incurred by drivers nationwide?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
